Articles.Content:
anyone else having problems running 1.1.3 on the latest OS X?

I can start the launcher, and get into the game menu. But starting a game results in no movement past the loading screen (the little whirly thing in the bottom right corner, and its not whirling).

 

RJ

I have just had the same experience immediately after purchasing and downloading for the first time.

Did you ever get a solution or do I need to get a refund?

Thanks
For some reason the download didn't do something correctly.  In the logs it still thought it was 1.05. Re download and re install fixed the problem.

Support have now contacted me and setting the anti-aliasing to Off allowed 1.1.3 to load on my 10.11.6.

Hopefully this will be added to the self-help list.

Thanks for the reply
